participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and disciplined, enjoys physical challenges and intellectual pursuits.
participant_1.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher.
